mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry (account_id, entity_id, title, content, file, created_at) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{entityId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{file}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT i.id, i.account_id AS accountId, a.email AS accountEmail, a.nickname AS accountNickname, i.entity_id AS entityId, e.name AS entityName, i.title, i.content, i.file, i.created_at AS createdAt, i.status FROM inquiry i LEFT JOIN account a ON i.account_id = a.id LEFT JOIN event_entity e ON i.entity_id = e.id WHERE i.status = #{status} ORDER BY i.id ASC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inquiry WHERE status = #{status}
